Package sample.utility.testrail

Class APIClient

java.lang.Object
sample.utility.testrail.APIClient
public class APIClient
extends java.lang.Object
API class for calling testrail and making test result requests
Since:
12/05/2019
Author:
TestRail - modified by Eric Tyree

    • sendGet

      public java.lang.Object sendGet​(java.lang.String uri, java.lang.String data) throws java.io.IOException, APIException
      Issues a GET request (read) against the API and returns the result
      Parameters:
      uri - The API method to call including parameters (e.g. get_case/1)
      data - The data to submit as part of the request (e.g. a map)
      Returns:
      parsed JSON response as standard object which can either be an instance of JSONObject or JSONArray
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if return of the POST request is null
      APIException - if POST request fails

    • sendGet

      public java.lang.Object sendGet​(java.lang.String uri) throws java.io.IOException, APIException
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      APIException

    • sendPost

      public java.lang.Object sendPost​(java.lang.String uri, java.lang.Object data) throws java.io.IOException, APIException
      Issues a POST request (write) against the API and returns the result
      Parameters:
      uri - The API method to call including parameter (e.g. add_case/1)
      data - The data to submit as part of the request (e.g. a map)
      Returns:
      Returns the parsed JSON response as standard object which can either be an instance of JSONObject or JSONArray
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if return of the POST request is null
      APIException - if POST request fails
